He use to sit at the edge of my bed..but now he says im getting too old and big to fit him. So now, he takes a seat at my drawing table chair,crosses his leg,takes off his glasses,lays his strong hands upon his knees crossed, and wobbles his right foot up and down a bit. Just the same as if he was meeting with one of his students or staff at the university. 
He asks, "So, are you going to join us for dinner tonight, I would love to have your company." I smile in flatter cuz everything my grandfather does for me is flattering. "Yes, i gueess so.", I say. So we make the agreement and shake on it. He pulls my comforter off my huddled body and gives me his hands and gazes at me with his blue puppy dog eyes and always says,"You see, that wasnt so hard, now was it?" And of course, i always have to say, "Guess not." as opposed to "No." just to make it a little difficult just to be difficult. 
I was thinking, well im always thinking what im going to do w/o him in my life...i need him to be here for when im wed, when i have my first and last child and when my "husband" and i get in a huge fight and i have nowhere to go.
